description:
Leather palms are durable and provide dexterity for keeping a grip on your poles. The waterproof shells wrap your hands in comfort when the gusts blow straight down the slopes.

  • VarioShell nylon shell fabric with DWR treatment for superior waterproofness
  • Goatskin leather palms for durability and grip
  • Microfleece insulation, heavier on the back of hands for warmth, lighter on the palms for dexterity
  • Clips keep them together when you're not wearing them
name: MEC T1 Warm Patrol Waterproof Gloves - Unisex
